actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to make certain technical and conforming amendments to correct the Health Care Safety Net Amendments of 2002.
short_title: Health Care Safety Net Amendments Technical Corrections Act of 2003
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Health Care Safety Net Amendments Technical Corrections Act of 2003 - Amends the Public Health Service Act and the Health Care Safety Net Amendments of 2002 to make technical and conforming amendments respecting: (1) health centers; (2) rural health outreach; (3) telehealth; (4) mental health services via telehealth; (5) health professional shortage areas; and (6) National Health Service Corps personnel, scholarships, and loan repayment. Authorizes grants to State professional licensing boards for State cooperation to reduce statutory and regulatory barriers to telemedicine.

titles.title: Health Care Safety Net Amendments Technical Corrections Act of 2003
A bill to make certain technical and conforming amendments to correct the Health Care Safety Net Amendments of 2002.
